text: A person asked a mobile mechanic to look at their car, to determine if it was feasible to repair. The person was on a limited budget, and needed the car to be able to go to work. The mobile mechanic told the person after checking the vehicle that it was going to be extremely expensive and time consuming to fix, and they would be better served to get something else. Person was very upset and told the mechanic it wasnt possible with the limited income and the fact that they had been living in the vehicle. The mobile mechanic went to a local Ford dealership and bought that person a newer previously owned vehicle. Drove it to the spot where they had left the person and handed them the keys.   But it was going to
